title.narrative: Technical Assistance for Banking & Financial Services - Kazakhstan

description.narrative: The goal of this project is to strengthen FPL's capacity to analyze, value, and resolve distressed assets as part of a broader set of reforms aimed at strengthening and stabilizing Kazakhstan's financial sector in support of sustainable economic growth and development. Activities include assisting the FPL to strengthen their analysis of currently held distressed assets, organize assets into categories for sale or continued holding, develop market mechanisms to appropriately dispose of distressed assets, and develop a strategic plan to clarify when and how the FPL will participate in future distressed asset purchases.

activity-date.narrative: Date unavailable. Calculated start date is the earliest transaction date
Date unavailable. Calculated end date is the latest transaction date

person-name.narrative: Andrew Velthaus, Jennifer Lee, and Kelley Vito
